THE WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST
WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  18
A copy of the WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist can be downloaded as a separate document,  
and can be found on WHO and Ariadne Labs websites. 
The WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist was developed according to WHO guidelines and inter-
national standards of care. However, modifying the Checklist may be necessary to reflect 
contextual facto
